summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganMade with 90% naturally derived ingredients, BareMinerals ORIGINAL Liquid Mineral Brightening Concealer is a creamy concealer shown to visibly brighten dark circles and reduce the look of fine lines. Provides medium buildable coverage with a luminous finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the look of fine linesDelivers crease-resistant, all-day wear with a luminous finishHas a lightweight, creamy feelDermatologist-testedOphthalmologist-testedNon-comedogenicResearch ResultsInstantly brightens, smooths and perfects skin textureInstantly conceals and hydrates under eyesInstantly reduces sign of fatigue (undereye circles)Reduces sign of fatigue (undereye circles) after 24H of wear*based on an independent clinical testKey IngredientsMineral Coated Pigments: Visibly brighten skin to minimize the appearance of dark circlesWhite Water Lily Extract: Helps to soothe and hydrate skin for a smooth, plumped lookItem 2641123How To UseHow to conceal dark circles:Choose a concealer shade 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone.Apply three dots of concealer to the under eye area using the doe-foot applicator, then blend outward with fingers or the Max Coverage Concealer Brush.Build as needed for fuller coverage.How to correct blemishes and imperfections:Choose the concealer shade that matches your skin tone.Apply directly onto imperfections with the applicator, then blend with your ring finger or the Max Coverage Concealer Brush.Tip: If using liquid foundation, apply ORIGINAL Liquid Mineral Concealer after your foundation. If using powder foundation, apply ORIGINAL Liquid Mineral Concealer before your foundation.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Tetradecane, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-20 Olefin), Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Propanediol, Decyl Isostearate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isostearic Acid, Nymphaea Alba Flower Extract, Silica, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cetyl Alcohol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Mica. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: How to conceal dark circles:Choose a concealer shade 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone.Apply three dots of concealer to the under eye area using the doe-foot applicator, then blend outward with fingers or the Max Coverage Concealer Brush.Build as needed for fuller coverage.How to correct blemishes and imperfections:Choose the concealer shade that matches your skin tone.Apply directly onto imperfections with the applicator, then blend with your ring finger or the Max Coverage Concealer Brush.Tip: If using liquid foundation, apply ORIGINAL Liquid Mineral Concealer after your foundation. If using powder foundation, apply ORIGINAL Liquid Mineral Concealer before your foundation.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: Terrible Color Range for Fair Skin
reviews.comments: Even the lightest shade was too dark for me, and the undertones are terrible. All the shades run super yellow or super orange.

reviews.headline: Liquid Gold
reviews.comments: I had been using a Clinique concealer, their Airbrush, for many years. The optical brighteners were game changers for me! But when they discontinued the product, I freaked out. I must have tried four other concealers to no avail. They were either too chalky, too heavy, or too drying. Since I already had used and loved BM's Complexion Rescue Gel Makeup for years, I thought I'd give this concealer a shot. WOW. I use it around my eyes, nostrils, and just above and below my lips. It's like a facelift, really. I consider this the core of my makeup now. Without it, I do not know what I'd do. It actually makes the Gel makeup work better. It's not cheap, but it's the real deal.

reviews.headline: This concealer is absolute trash
reviews.comments: It blends HORRIBLY ive tried with different sponges , brushed etc and it is just horrible it sits into the dry spots on your skin and never blends evenly . Just save your money , this is the worst concealer ive ever used .

reviews.headline: Caution contains comedogenic ingredient!
reviews.comments: STOP! I know it may be tempting to get this product because it's a cleaner makeup but just don't. Used it for a month huge acne flare up never had acne until now. Contains comedogenic ingredient lauroyl lysine. Enlarges pores as well. Not worth the money at all.

reviews.headline: fail
reviews.comments: iam a due hard bare minerals firl love the original set, this concealer shde is off  o got 3.5n whixh is a median tan neautral peachy tones its very yellow very, its also very lightweight drys very powdery its buildable but again drys sown yucky. its like a tinted moisturizer for your eyes for somoe eho has nothing to cover ouly skin itherwise i like my mabeline 7 concealer way better

reviews.headline: bareMinerals Liquid Mineral Concealer is an amazing product!
reviews.comments: I've been using BareMinerals for years, and I have noticed the product keeps improving. The coverage is clean. It doesn't clump! It's application is great and the coverage lasts. I typically use a lighter shade under my eyes for a brighter look and then blend it with a slightly darker tone for beautiful seamless coverage. I highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Wrong color
reviews.comments: I would like to exchange it for a lighter color

reviews.headline: A concealer that doesn't conceal
reviews.comments:
Bought this to replace my serum concealer which, whilst rich for my skin type, was a fabulous product that actually did what it says on the tin; conceal. THIS item however, does no such thing.

The shades have changed and my corresponding shade is now very yellow. Note; I have yellow in my skin, but this is very unnatural looking and almost android-like. Not flatteting AT ALL.
Then, its so thin, runny and dries so fast that it's impossible to conceal anything. I have no idea what or how to use this product. A concealer should conceal, not be sheer.
It's almost as if a key ingredient (the serum perhaps?) in the OG formula was completely removed or something. 

Ive already moved on to another concealer brand and been buying from them. This new formulation from bareMinerals sadly is a hard pass for me. I like my products to work and do what they say they are going to do. Unfortunately, this item is no longer it for me.

reviews.headline: I'll buy again
reviews.comments: Why did I wait so long to use this concealer? Glad I have it now to diminish my dark circles!

reviews.headline: Best concealer
reviews.comments: This is really the best concealer it covers beautiful.and last all day without primer on my face or setting powder or spray .

reviews.headline: best concealer
reviews.comments: this is the best concealer i use color 0.5C it covers all my freckles and scars on my face and stays all day without using primer . I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a long lasting non caking concealer and the finish is beautiful.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: Covers sunspots and blemishes without being too heavy. The variety of shades make it easy to find one that works for you.

reviews.headline: Great Coverage & Blen
reviews.comments: Blends nicely with both my bare minerals foundation and the tinted moisturizer + luminizer. Also completely covers the dark circles and bags under my eyes (which is a lot coming from a tired college student)

reviews.headline: Best concealer ever
reviews.comments: The greatest concealer of all! It has great coverage, doesn't feel heavy on the skin, and doesn't crease.

reviews.headline: My favorite ever!
reviews.comments: If you have a water based routine, this blends like a dream! Literally looks like skin. The shade also matches me soooo perfectly. If you're a pale Asian girl and looking for a peachy concealer, get 0.5 N! :)

reviews.headline: Best concealer for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have VERY sensitive/acne-prone skin and this concealer covers my blemishes without the fear that im going to break out the next morning. It matches my skin tone perfect and only a small amount of product is needed to cover my redness and acne.

reviews.headline: It's a nice medium coverage concealee
reviews.comments: I like it since I was looking for a hydrating medium coverage concealer. It doesn't crease on me but I'm only 24 so. A little goes a long way, to me it melts into a medium coverage. I think this works only for the undereyes. It didn't oxidize on me either. If you are looking for a full coverage then this isn't it. It's definitely not sheer though, very much a true medium coverage.

reviews.headline: Great concealer!
reviews.comments: This concealer is great! It's easy to blend and not heavy, sticky, or drying. I love that the ingredients are clean and so does my sensitive skin. I use it over the pressed powder foundation & finish with the pressed mineral veil powder. Beautiful!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Easy to use and blends well.

This is such a good concealer!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I got this concealer for free in return for a truthful review, and when I make that commitment, I follow through, even if the review isn't positive. I'm not buttering up a company just to get more free things, I do this for people like me who need thorough reviews before they buy something! 

I'll start by saying, that as a reviewer, I don't always get the right color of something. I am also extremely pale, and not a lot of companies carry shades that match me.
I was not send the lightest shade, but that's okay, because I have 3 kids and a husband that I can use to help me! In this case, my husband!

The first thing I noticed was how thin the product was when rubbing it between two fingers. It is almost watery, but not runny, just incredibly light weight, unlike most concealers I've used over the years. It's weightless on the skin, can't be felt at all!

Even with it being a weightless and thin product there's absolutely NO inadequacy when it comes to coverage! Its covering power is amazing! 

My favorite thing about it was how natural it looked. We all know how it is to put makeup over peach fuzz and it just messes up the whole look, but that's not an issue with this concealer at all! Put it in my husband and there was no product clinging to his peach fuzz on his upper cheeks at all! Even over peach fuzz, it still looked like skin!

This product truly looks like skin! It's incredible! It covers dark under eyes, redness, and blemishes.

I absolutely love it and I think it's going to be a product my husband is actually going to use! (YES! It really is THAT natural looking!!)
faceoff_positive.headline: Looks like skin!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I absolutely loved their serum concealer and was devastated that they discontinued it. The serum concealer was my holy Grail of concealers. The new original concealer does have a better range of shades, but it is not an adequate replacement for the serum concealer. This one dries very quickly, which made it a bit difficult to blend. It is also impossible to blend over makeup throughout the day, if you need to touch up your makeup. This one also does not go on as smooth as its predecessor and does not look as natural for me. It also gets a little cakey if trying to layer for better coverage (it also doesn't seem to provide as full of coverage as their serum concealer did, so I have to let it dry and try to layer it on a couple of darker spots on my skin.) If not comparing to their serum concealer, it's overall not a bad product on it's own. Had I not tried their serum concealer and loved it for so long, I probably would have given this one a higher rating. I may buy it again until I find another product that I love, but will be shopping around for a better replacement for their serum concealer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not an adequate replacement for their serum concealer
